sideTab === 'history' && ( history.length === 0 ? (

No history yet

Send a request to see it here

) : ( <> {history.slice(0, 50).map((entry, i) => (
loadFromHistory(entry)} className="flex-1 min-w-0" role="button" aria-label={`Load ${entry.request.method} ${entry.request.url} from history`} >
{entry.request.method.slice(0, 3)} {entry.response && ( {entry.response.status} )}
{entry.request.url.replace(/^https?:\/\//, '')}
))} ) )

patterns.name: useEffect_deps
patterns.description: Convert useEffect with deps to inline in message handler
patterns.sigil:
// Inline in the message that changes count:
on Increment { self.count += 1; self.save(); }
